column3: I haven't been trying hard enough. {{c1::I'm going to try|I am going to try}} (I / try) harder.
I have to make a speech tomorrow, but I don't know what {{c1::I'm going to say|I am going to say}} (I / say).
We've got no money. What {{c1::are we going to do}} (we / do)?

A: The car is very dirty.
B: I know. {{c1::I'm going to wash|I am going to wash}} (I / wash) it.
{{c1::I'm going to learn|I am going to learn}} (I / learn) a foreign language, but I don't know which one.
One day {{c1::I'm going to run|I am going to run}} (I / run) in a marathon. It's my ambition.
